          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A körmozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Circular Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Mouvement Circulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Movimento Circular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Movimento Circolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κυκλική κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Movimiento Circular</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A körmozgás leírásához használt fogalmak (vezérsugár, ívhossz, szögelfordulás).</string>
            <string language="en-US">Terms Used to Describe Circular Motion (Radius Vector, Arc Length, Angular Rotation).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">fizika</string>
            <string language="en-US">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">haladó mozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">translational motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">körmozgás</string>
            <string language="en-US">circular motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vezérsugár</string>
            <string language="en-US">guiding ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">szögelfordulás</string>
            <string language="en-US">angular turn</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bezeichnungen verwendeten, kreisförmige Bewegung
(Radius-Vektor, Bogen-Länge, eckige Umdrehung) zu beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les limites décrivaient le mouvement circulaire 
(vecteur de rayon, longueur d'arc, rotation angulaire).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os termos usaram-se descrever o movimento 
circular (vetor do raio, comprimento do arco, rotação angular).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I termini hanno usato descrivere il movimento 
circolare (vettore del raggio, lunghezza dell'arco, rotazione 
angolare).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όροι που χρησιμοποιούνται για να περιγράψουν την 
κυκλική κίνηση (διάνυσμα ακτίνας, μήκος τόξων, γωνιακή 
περιστροφή).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los términos describían el movimiento circular 
(vector del radio, longitud del arco, rotación angular).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">translational Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kreisförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">leitender Strahl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">eckige Umdrehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement de translation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement circulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raie de guidage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tour angulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
